thread.title: steve

author: steve
title: steve
text: Having back problems, you can imagine searching for the perfect mattress can become an obsession, buying it online may not have been my first option since you can't actually try it. I took a leap of faith based on the excellent construction design explained on the website and the awesome customer service representatives that answered all my questions. I started with a Queen mattress and foundation about a year ago and have now replaced 3 mattresses in our house with Saatva. Nothing to lose, if you don't like it they will take it back, I doubt they get many returns! Oh and the price is less than half of what I was going to pay at a mattress store.
